Model.name: Model
Model.description: This section contains all base drawable objects. These can be used as a basis for game-specific objects.

Drawables.name: Drawables
Drawables.description: This section contains all base drawable objects. These can be used as a basis for game-specific objects.

BaseDrawable.name: BaseDrawable
BaseDrawable.description: This is the base drawable class from which all drawable objects inherit. It can also be used on its own as an empty object which contains children.

RectangleDrawable.name: RectangleDrawable
RectangleDrawable.description: Object that is drawn as a rectangle. As with every drawable object, it inherits from <BaseDrawable>.

TextDrawable.name: TextDrawable
TextDrawable.description: A textbox. As with every drawable object, it inherits from <BaseDrawable>.

SpriteDrawable.name: SpriteDrawable
SpriteDrawable.description: An object that is drawn as an image. As with every drawable object, it inherits from <BaseDrawable>.

ButtonDrawable.name: ButtonDrawable
ButtonDrawable.description: A button object. Inherits from <SpriteDrawable>, which inherits from <BaseDrawable>.

classitems.description: True if control key is pressed down.
classitems.name: isCtrl

classitems.description: Array of all the keycodes and their boolean state.
classitems.name: keyDown

classitems.description: Initializes the Controller.
classitems.name: init

return.description: True when everything has been loaded.

classitems.description: update function will be called before every draw call.
classitems.name: base_update

classitems.description:
update function will be called before every draw call.
Most of the game logic will be put in here.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: will be called by the <View> when an object has been pressed with the mouse button.
classitems.name: mouse_objectClick

params.name: object
params.description: Object that has been pressed by the mouse button.

classitems.description:
will be called by the <View> when an object has been double clicked with the mouse button.
method mouse_objectDoubleClick

params.name: object
params.description: Object that has been double clicked by the mouse button.

classitems.description: will be called by the <View> when an object is being hovered the mouse.
classitems.name: mouse_objectHover

params.name: object
params.description: Object that is being hovered by the mouse.

classitems.description:
will be called by the <View> when an object is not being hovered anymore by the mouse.
method mouse_objectHoverOut

params.name: object
params.description: Object that is not being hovered anymore by the mouse.

classitems.description: The name of this object.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: Where the variable will be drawn in pixels of the canvas. Relative to its parent if it has one.
classitems.name: position

classitems.description: The size of the object is used to draw the object and to check for mouse input. Make sure all buttons that are childs of this object fall inside its size.
classitems.name: size

classitems.description: Used to scale the size.
classitems.name: scale

classitems.description: Determines its rotation in radians. Relative to its parent if it has one.
classitems.name: rotation

classitems.description: The depth of this object is stored in here, changing this wont have effect.
classitems.name: depth

classitems.description: Determines the colour to draw it with, if applicable.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: Determines its alpha channel between 1 and 0.
classitems.name: alpha

classitems.description: Determines whether it is visible (boolean).
classitems.name: visible

classitems.description: Determines if the objct is active, if it is the update method will be called.
classitems.name: active

classitems.description: Contains its parent. If the object has no parent, it contains "null".
classitems.name: parent

classitems.description: Array which contains all of its children.
classitems.name: drawableObjects

classitems.description: Determines which type of cursor is used when the mouse hovers over the object.
classitems.name: cursor

classitems.description: This function will be called when this object is being cloned.
classitems.name: onCloneInit

classitems.description: This function will be called when this object has been added into the drawable list.
classitems.name: onDrawInit

classitems.description: Will check if this object is visible and if so will render itself to the canvas plus all its children.
classitems.name: base_draw

return.description: returns false if this object is not visible

classitems.description: Will check if this object is visible and if so will update itself to the canvas plus all its children.
classitems.name: base_update

classitems.description: Contains the HTML5 redering part for this object.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Will be called before every draw call.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Will be called when this object is added into the drawlist of another object.
classitems.name: setParent

classitems.description: Will add a new object as child and will render it in the future.
classitems.name: addDrawable

params.name: elem
params.description: Element (object) of base type <BaseDrawable> to be added into the rendering list.

params.name: depth
params.description: When should this element be drawn? the lowest will be drawn at the most back.

classitems.description: Removes a <BaseDrawable> from the drawing list.
classitems.name: removeDrawable

params.name: elem
params.description: Element (object) of base type <BaseDrawable> to be removed from the rendering list.

classitems.description: Checks through its children and returns the first one that contains the position [x, y]. If none is found, returns itself.
classitems.name: getobjectatpos

return.description: Most forward child at position [x, y] or itself.

classitems.description: Triggered when the object is clicked.
classitems.name: onclick

classitems.description: Triggered when the mouse hovers over the object.
classitems.name: onhover

classitems.description: Triggered when the mouse moves out of the object.
classitems.name: onmouseout

classitems.description: The colour of the rectangle's border
classitems.name: borderColor

classitems.description: The width of the rectangle's border
classitems.name: borderWidth

classitems.description: Draws the rectangle.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Contains the text to draw
classitems.name: text

classitems.description: The colour of the text box's border
classitems.name: borderColor

classitems.description: The width of the text box's border
classitems.name: BorderWidth

classitems.description: Determines the font information to use when drawing the text.
classitems.name: font

classitems.description: Draws the text.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Experimently function, goal is to make it only switch fonts if necesary.
classitems.name: setStyle

classitems.description: Sets the text. Automatically adjusts the width of the object so it fits the complete new text.
classitems.name: setText

classitems.description: Contains image element used to draw.
classitems.name: _image

classitems.description: Contains the source link or path for the current image.
classitems.name: curImage

classitems.description: Magic function that is called when the image has been loaded onto the user's computer.
classitems.name: onload

classitems.description: Used to load an image into the sprite. Also sets curImage to the given path.
classitems.name: load

params.name: src
params.description: The source of the image to load in as a full or relative link/path.

classitems.description: Draws the image if it has been loaded.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Text to draw on the button. Leave empty to draw no text.
classitems.name: text

classitems.description: Font to use for drawing the text.
classitems.name: font

classitems.description: Cursor type to show when hovering this object, see a html cursors table for this
classitems.name: cursor

classitems.description: Position of the button's text, relative to its own.
classitems.name: textPos

classitems.description: Triggered when the object is clicked. If this function is not changed, it will also trigger the function nameofobject_onclick if it is defined outside any class.
classitems.name: onclick

classitems.description: Draws the button and its text if it has it.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Clones the object and all it contains and returns the clone.
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Extend the object with functions and fields given.
classitems.name: extend

params.name: data
params.description: JSON which should be added to the current object.

return.description: original object plus all the content from the given data object.

classitems.description: Clones the Date and returns the clone.
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Clones the Number and returns the clone.
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Clones the Boolean and returns the clone.
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Clones the String and returns the clone.
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Formats money to a more human-readable form and returns it.
classitems.name: formatMoney

params.name: c
params.description: Number of decimals to round at.

params.name: d
params.description: Character set between numbers to keep them readable. (3000000 -> 3[d]000[d]000) Defaults to ","

params.name: t
params.description: Character set between full numbers and the decimal fractions. (1.5 -> 1[t]5) Defaults to "."

classitems.description: Inserts an item into an array at the given index
classitems.name: insert

params.name: index
params.description: position in the array the new item should take place.

classitems.description: HTML ID for the Canvas element to use.
classitems.name: canvasID

classitems.description: Contains the canvas element.
classitems.name: canvas

classitems.description: Contains the Canvas' 2D renderer.
classitems.name: ctx

classitems.description: targeted fps which you like to run this game at (default 50).
classitems.name: fps

classitems.description: (do not set) time to start the next update/draw., will be set by start function
classitems.name: fpsinterval

classitems.description: Last FPS.
classitems.name: lastfps

classitems.description: will count up every frame it renders.
classitems.name: fpscounter

classitems.description: (do not set) will count to 1 with deltatime and when hit will grab <fpscounter> count and set it into <lastfps>.
classitems.name: fpstimer

classitems.description: The width of the game in pixels.
classitems.name: canvasWidth

classitems.description: The height of the game in pixels.
classitems.name: canvasHeight

classitems.description: Object currently being clicked on by the mouse.
classitems.name: mhoverObject

classitems.description: Object which the mouse is hovering over.
classitems.name: mdownObject

classitems.description: Initializes the View, Connects to the canvas and gets its variables. Sets desired FPS.
classitems.name: init

return.description: True if it could connect to the HTML canvas with the canvas ID. Otherwise false.

classitems.description: Draws every object on the canvas every frame.
classitems.name: base_draw

classitems.description: Will return the position of the mouse on the canvas.
classitems.name: mouseposition

classitems.description: Called when the mouse is clicked. Will set <mdownObject> to the currently clicked object.
classitems.name: mousedown

classitems.description:
Called when the mouse moves.

Will call the <Controller.mouse_objectHover> when <mhoverObject> is hovered by the mouse.
Will call the <Controller.mouse_objectHoverOut> when <mhoverObject> is no longer being hovered.
classitems.name: mousemove

classitems.description: When the mouse hovers out of an object this function will be called to return settings to their defaults.
classitems.name: setstyledefaults

classitems.description:
Called when the mouse is clicked twice in short succession.
Will call <Controller.mouse_objectDoubleClick>
classitems.name: mousedblclick

classitems.description: Will get the object at the given position.
classitems.name: getobjectatpos

classitems.description: Initializes MVC main objects, then initializes the game and starts the game loop.
classitems.name: HTML5_2DRE_start

classitems.description: Main loop which calls all the update and draw functions.
classitems.name: HTML5_2DRE_gameLoop

classitems.description: Initializes the game (not rendering engine).
classitems.name: HTML5_2DRE_initialize
